body: All the animated object's melee or ranged attacks do damage as though it were one size category larger. A crafter must purchase Improved Attack separately for melee and ranged attacks.
name: Improved Attack (Ex, 1 CP)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Improved Attack (Ex/1 CP)
